Code: EXEC SQL SELECT VALUE(SUM (T1.VAL_OPERACAO), 0) FROM SEGUROS.SINISTRO_HISTORICO T1, SEGUROS.SINISTRO_HISTORICO T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.SIT_REGISTRO <> '2' AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND T2.COD_OPERACAO = T1.COD_OPERACAO AND T2.FUNCAO_OPERACAO IN ('LIB','JLIND') WITH UR END SQL
